data.title: Indian Idol Winners List: Season 1-14 (2024)
data.meta_description: In this article, we will look into the list of winners of the Indian Idol ofall seasons from season 1 to season 14.
data.text:
Season 14 of the singing reality TV show, Indian Idol, concluded on March 3, 2024. Vaibhav Gupta from Kanpur won the 2024 edition of the show. He took home ₹25 lakh rupees and a Maruti Suzuki Brezza. After winning, Vaibhav said that he wanted to do playback singing for Salman Khan, Vicky Kaushal, and Ranveer Singh. The other finalists for the singing contest were Anjana Padmanabhan, Ananya Pal, Piyush Panwar, Subhadeep Das, and Adya Mishra.

Indian Idol is a singing reality tv show broadcast on Sony TV that has gained immense popularity over the years. It has provided a platform for talented singers to showcase their skills and pursue a career in the music industry.

In this article, we will look into the list of winners of all seasons of the Indian Idol, 1 to 14.
